<!-- AI-Proof Your Assessments ‚Äî Experience 4: Assessment Design -->
<!-- 45-75 minutes | Teaching-focused -->

<div id="experience-app" data-experience-id="ai-proof-assessments" style="font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', serif; max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 20px; color: #1E293B;">

  <!-- Header -->
  <div style="background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0F172A 0%, #1E293B 100%); border-radius: 16px; padding: 32px; margin-bottom: 28px;">
    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 3px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 8px;">Experience 4 of 5</div>
    <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
      <span style="font-size: 48px;">üõ°Ô∏è</span>
      <div>
        <h1 style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 28px; color: #F1F5F9; margin: 0; letter-spacing: 1px;">AI-PROOF YOUR ASSESSMENTS</h1>
        <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Assessment Design</p>
      </div>
    </div>
    <p style="font-size: 15px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 0; line-height: 1.6;">Move from "catching AI use" to designing assessments that demonstrate authentic learning‚Äîregardless of what tools students use along the way.</p>
    <div style="margin-top: 16px; display: flex; gap: 12px; flex-wrap: wrap;">
      <span style="background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); padding: 6px 12px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 12px; color: #94A3B8; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;">‚è±Ô∏è 45-75 min</span>
      <span style="background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1); padding: 6px 12px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 12px; color: #94A3B8; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;">üìö Teaching-focused</span>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Learning Outcomes -->
  <div style="background: #F0FDF4; border: 1px solid #BBF7D0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 28px;">
    <h3 style="font-size: 14px; color: #14532D; margin: 0 0 12px 0; font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 1px;">By the end of this experience, you will:</h3>
    <ul style="margin: 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #166534; line-height: 1.8;">
      <li>Identify vulnerabilities in traditional assessments that AI can exploit</li>
      <li>Apply three distinct pathways for redesigning assessments</li>
      <li>Transform an existing assessment using AI-resilient principles</li>
      <li>Shift focus from "catching AI use" to "demonstrating learning"</li>
    </ul>
  </div>

  <!-- Activity 1: Stress-Test Your Assessment -->
  <div style="margin-bottom: 32px;">
    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">Activity 1</div>
    <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Stress-Test Your Assessment</h2>
    <p style="color: #64748B; margin-bottom: 20px;">Before you can redesign, you need to understand the vulnerability. Enter an assessment brief below to see how AI might attempt it‚Äîand where that approach would fall short.</p>

    <div style="background: white; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
      <label style="display: block; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 12px; color: #0F172A;">Paste or type your assessment brief:</label>
      <textarea id="assessment-brief" placeholder="Example: Write a 2000-word essay analyzing the marketing strategy of a company of your choice. Include theory from weeks 1-6 and provide recommendations for improvement." style="width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; min-height: 120px; padding: 16px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 8px; font-family: Georgia, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; resize: vertical;"></textarea>
      <button onclick="analyzeAssessment()" style="margin-top: 16px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #4F46E5, #7C3AED); color: white; border: none; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer;">Analyze Vulnerabilities</button>
    </div>

    <div id="vulnerability-analysis" style="display: none;">
      <div style="background: #FEF3C7; border: 1px solid #F59E0B; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px;">
          <span style="font-size: 24px;">‚ö†Ô∏è</span>
          <div>
            <strong style="color: #92400E;">How AI might approach this:</strong>
            <div id="ai-approach" style="margin: 12px 0 0 0; color: #78350F; line-height: 1.6;"></div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <div style="background: white; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px;">
        <h3 style="font-size: 16px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Vulnerability Checklist</h3>
        <div id="vulnerability-checklist" style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px;"></div>
      </div>

      <div style="background: #F0FDF4; border: 1px solid #BBF7D0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-top: 16px;">
        <strong style="color: #14532D;">The key insight:</strong>
        <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #166534; line-height: 1.6;">Traditional assessments often test whether students can produce content that sounds right. AI excels at this. Effective redesign focuses on what AI cannot do: demonstrate personal growth, apply knowledge to unique contexts, and explain the reasoning behind decisions.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Activity 2: Choose Your Pathway -->
  <div style="margin-bottom: 32px;">
    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">Activity 2</div>
    <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Choose Your Pathway</h2>
    <p style="color: #64748B; margin-bottom: 20px;">There's no single solution to AI-proofing assessments. Instead, consider three complementary approaches. Click each card to explore how it works and when to use it.</p>

    <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 16px;">

      <!-- Pathway A: Process Documentation -->
      <div id="pathway-a" class="pathway-card" onclick="togglePathway('a')" style="background: white; border: 2px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #EEF2FF; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px;">üìù</div>
          <div style="flex: 1;">
            <h3 style="font-size: 18px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">Pathway A: Process Documentation</h3>
            <p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Show the journey, not just the destination</p>
          </div>
          <span id="pathway-a-arrow" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.3s ease;">‚ñº</span>
        </div>
        <div id="pathway-a-content" style="display: none; padding-top: 16px; border-top: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">
          <p style="color: #334155; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Instead of just submitting a final product, students document their entire process‚Äîincluding any AI assistance.</p>

          <div style="background: #F8FAFC; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
            <strong style="color: #0F172A;">What students submit:</strong>
            <ul style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #334155; line-height: 1.8;">
              <li>AI conversation transcripts (if used)</li>
              <li>Annotations explaining where AI was wrong or limited</li>
              <li>Reflection on how human expertise improved the output</li>
              <li>Evidence of iteration and thinking evolution</li>
            </ul>
          </div>

          <div style="background: #F0FDF4; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
            <strong style="color: #14532D;">Best for:</strong>
            <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #166534;">Written assignments, reports, case analyses‚Äîany task where the thinking process matters as much as the output.</p>
          </div>

          <div style="background: #EEF2FF; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong style="color: #312E81;">Example transformation:</strong>
            <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #4338CA; font-style: italic;">"Write a marketing plan" becomes "Submit your marketing plan with a 500-word process reflection explaining your key decisions, what sources (including AI) you consulted, and what you would do differently."</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Pathway B: In-Class Components -->
      <div id="pathway-b" class="pathway-card" onclick="togglePathway('b')" style="background: white; border: 2px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #FEF3C7; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px;">üé§</div>
          <div style="flex: 1;">
            <h3 style="font-size: 18px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">Pathway B: In-Class Components</h3>
            <p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Demonstrate understanding in real-time</p>
          </div>
          <span id="pathway-b-arrow" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.3s ease;">‚ñº</span>
        </div>
        <div id="pathway-b-content" style="display: none; padding-top: 16px; border-top: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">
          <p style="color: #334155; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Add live components where students must demonstrate understanding without AI assistance‚Äînot as "gotcha" tests, but as opportunities to show mastery.</p>

          <div style="background: #F8FAFC; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
            <strong style="color: #0F172A;">Formats that work:</strong>
            <ul style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #334155; line-height: 1.8;">
              <li><strong>Viva voce:</strong> 10-15 minute conversation about their submission</li>
              <li><strong>Real-time synthesis:</strong> Apply their work to a new scenario in class</li>
              <li><strong>Oral defense:</strong> Present findings and respond to questions</li>
              <li><strong>Peer review discussion:</strong> Explain and defend choices to classmates</li>
            </ul>
          </div>

          <div style="background: #F0FDF4; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
            <strong style="color: #14532D;">Best for:</strong>
            <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #166534;">High-stakes assessments, verifying understanding of complex submissions, developing professional communication skills.</p>
          </div>

          <div style="background: #FEF3C7; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong style="color: #92400E;">Example transformation:</strong>
            <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #78350F; font-style: italic;">"Submit a business case" becomes "Submit your business case, then present the key recommendation in a 5-minute presentation where you'll respond to questions about your analysis."</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Pathway C: Personal Application -->
      <div id="pathway-c" class="pathway-card" onclick="togglePathway('c')" style="background: white; border: 2px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px; cursor: pointer; transition: all 0.3s ease;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 16px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #FCE7F3; width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 12px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-size: 24px;">üéØ</div>
          <div style="flex: 1;">
            <h3 style="font-size: 18px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">Pathway C: Personal Application</h3>
            <p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Connect to unique contexts AI cannot know</p>
          </div>
          <span id="pathway-c-arrow" style="font-size: 20px; color: #94A3B8; transition: transform 0.3s ease;">‚ñº</span>
        </div>
        <div id="pathway-c-content" style="display: none; padding-top: 16px; border-top: 1px solid #E2E8F0;">
          <p style="color: #334155; line-height: 1.7; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Design tasks that require information only the student has‚Äîtheir experiences, their data, their specific context. AI can help, but cannot replace the personal element.</p>

          <div style="background: #F8FAFC; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
            <strong style="color: #0F172A;">Elements that create uniqueness:</strong>
            <ul style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; padding-left: 20px; color: #334155; line-height: 1.8;">
              <li>Specific local organizations or contexts</li>
              <li>Primary data the student collects themselves</li>
              <li>Personal work or volunteer experiences</li>
              <li>Reflection on their own learning journey</li>
              <li>Connection to in-class discussions or activities</li>
            </ul>
          </div>

          <div style="background: #F0FDF4; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px; margin-bottom: 16px;">
            <strong style="color: #14532D;">Best for:</strong>
            <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #166534;">Developing professional identity, connecting theory to practice, capstone projects, reflective learning.</p>
          </div>

          <div style="background: #FCE7F3; padding: 16px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong style="color: #9D174D;">Example transformation:</strong>
            <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #BE185D; font-style: italic;">"Analyze marketing strategy" becomes "Interview someone at an organization you're connected to about their marketing challenges, then develop recommendations using concepts from weeks 3-5."</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

    </div>

    <div style="background: #F8FAFC; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px; margin-top: 20px;">
      <strong style="color: #0F172A;">Combining pathways:</strong>
      <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #64748B; line-height: 1.6;">These approaches work together. A strong AI-resilient assessment might combine personal application (Pathway C) with process documentation (Pathway A) and a brief oral component (Pathway B). Start with one, then layer as needed.</p>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Activity 3: Redesign Workshop -->
  <div style="margin-bottom: 32px;">
    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">Activity 3</div>
    <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Redesign Workshop</h2>
    <p style="color: #64748B; margin-bottom: 20px;">Now put it into practice. Work through this guided redesign of one of your assessments.</p>

    <div style="background: white; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 12px; padding: 24px;">

      <!-- Step 1 -->
      <div style="margin-bottom: 24px;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #4F46E5; color: white; width: 28px; height: 28px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px;">1</div>
          <h3 style="font-size: 16px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">What are you really assessing?</h3>
        </div>
        <p style="color: #64748B; margin: 0 0 12px 0; padding-left: 40px;">Strip away the format. What capability or understanding should students demonstrate?</p>
        <textarea id="redesign-step-1" placeholder="Example: Students should be able to critically evaluate a real marketing strategy and recommend evidence-based improvements." style="width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; min-height: 80px; padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 8px; font-family: Georgia, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; resize: vertical;"></textarea>
      </div>

      <!-- Step 2 -->
      <div style="margin-bottom: 24px;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #4F46E5; color: white; width: 28px; height: 28px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px;">2</div>
          <h3 style="font-size: 16px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">What would AI struggle with?</h3>
        </div>
        <p style="color: #64748B; margin: 0 0 12px 0; padding-left: 40px;">What aspects require human judgment, personal experience, or real-time demonstration?</p>
        <textarea id="redesign-step-2" placeholder="Example: AI doesn't know our case study from week 4, can't interview local business owners, and can't defend recommendations in person." style="width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; min-height: 80px; padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 8px; font-family: Georgia, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; resize: vertical;"></textarea>
      </div>

      <!-- Step 3 -->
      <div style="margin-bottom: 24px;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #4F46E5; color: white; width: 28px; height: 28px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px;">3</div>
          <h3 style="font-size: 16px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">Which pathway(s) fit best?</h3>
        </div>
        <p style="color: #64748B; margin: 0 0 12px 0; padding-left: 40px;">Select one or more approaches for your redesign:</p>
        <div style="padding-left: 40px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 8px;">
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" id="pathway-check-a" style="width: 18px; height: 18px;">
            <span style="color: #334155;"><strong>Process Documentation</strong> ‚Äî Submit drafts, prompts, reflections</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" id="pathway-check-b" style="width: 18px; height: 18px;">
            <span style="color: #334155;"><strong>In-Class Components</strong> ‚Äî Viva, presentation, live application</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" id="pathway-check-c" style="width: 18px; height: 18px;">
            <span style="color: #334155;"><strong>Personal Application</strong> ‚Äî Unique context, primary data, reflection</span>
          </label>
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Step 4 -->
      <div style="margin-bottom: 24px;">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #4F46E5; color: white; width: 28px; height: 28px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px;">4</div>
          <h3 style="font-size: 16px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">Draft your redesigned assessment brief</h3>
        </div>
        <p style="color: #64748B; margin: 0 0 12px 0; padding-left: 40px;">Rewrite the assessment incorporating your chosen approach(es):</p>
        <textarea id="redesign-step-4" placeholder="Example: Choose a local Perth business you have access to. Conduct a brief interview about their marketing challenges, then develop three evidence-based recommendations using frameworks from weeks 3-5. Submit: (1) interview notes, (2) your analysis with clear connections to course concepts, (3) a 300-word reflection on your process. Be prepared to present one recommendation in a 5-minute class slot." style="width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; min-height: 120px; padding: 12px; border: 1px solid #E2E8F0; border-radius: 8px; font-family: Georgia, serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6; resize: vertical;"></textarea>
      </div>

      <!-- Step 5 -->
      <div>
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px;">
          <div style="background: #4F46E5; color: white; width: 28px; height: 28px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px;">5</div>
          <h3 style="font-size: 16px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0;">Update your rubric criteria</h3>
        </div>
        <p style="color: #64748B; margin: 0 0 12px 0; padding-left: 40px;">What should your rubric now emphasize? Check what matters:</p>
        <div style="padding-left: 40px; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 8px;">
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Application to specific context</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Quality of reasoning</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Evidence of iteration</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Connection to course content</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Ability to explain/defend</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Personal reflection quality</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Primary data quality</span>
          </label>
          <label style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 8px; cursor: pointer;">
            <input type="checkbox" style="width: 16px; height: 16px;">
            <span style="color: #334155; font-size: 14px;">Synthesis across sources</span>
          </label>
        </div>
      </div>

      <button onclick="saveRedesign()" style="margin-top: 24px; background: #22C55E; color: white; border: none; padding: 12px 24px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; width: 100%;">Save My Redesign (to browser)</button>
      <p id="save-confirmation" style="display: none; text-align: center; color: #16A34A; margin: 12px 0 0 0; font-size: 14px;">Saved! Your redesign is stored in this browser.</p>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- In Your Context Tabs -->
  <div style="margin-bottom: 32px;">
    <div style="font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 11px; letter-spacing: 2px; color: #64748B; text-transform: uppercase; margin-bottom: 12px;">In Your Context</div>
    <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #0F172A; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Applying These Ideas to Your Role</h2>

    <!-- Tab Navigation -->
    <div style="display: flex; gap: 4px; margin-bottom: 0; border-bottom: 2px solid #E2E8F0;">
      <button class="context-tab active" data-tab="teaching" onclick="switchTab('teaching')" style="padding: 12px 20px; background: #4F46E5; color: white; border: none; border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0; cursor: pointer; font-size: 14px; font-weight: bold;">üìö Teaching</button>
      <button class="context-tab" data-tab="research" onclick="switchTab('research')" style="padding: 12px 20px; background: #F1F5F9; color: #64748B; border: none; border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0; cursor: pointer; font-size: 14px;">üî¨ Research</button>
      <button class="context-tab" data-tab="admin" onclick="switchTab('admin')" style="padding: 12px 20px; background: #F1F5F9; color: #64748B; border: none; border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0; cursor: pointer; font-size: 14px;">‚öôÔ∏è Admin</button>
    </div>

<script>
(function() {
  const experienceId = 'ai-proof-assessments';
  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const uid = urlParams.get('uid') || 'anonymous';

  // Activity 1: Vulnerability Analysis
  window.analyzeAssessment = function() {
    const brief = document.getElementById('assessment-brief').value.trim();
    if (!brief) {
      alert('Please enter an assessment brief to analyze.');
      return;
    }

    const analysisDiv = document.getElementById('vulnerability-analysis');
    analysisDiv.style.display = 'block';

    // Generate contextual analysis based on brief content
    const briefLower = brief.toLowerCase();
    let aiApproach = '';
    let vulnerabilities = [];

    // Detect assessment type and generate appropriate response
    if (briefLower.includes('essay') || briefLower.includes('write') || briefLower.includes('word')) {
      aiApproach = 'An AI could generate a well-structured essay with appropriate academic language, balanced arguments, and smooth transitions. It would produce content that "sounds right" but may lack genuine insight, specific local context, or authentic engagement with the topic.';
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üìù', text: 'Generic written output that sounds competent but lacks personal voice', risk: 'high' });
    }

    if (briefLower.includes('analyze') || briefLower.includes('analysis') || briefLower.includes('evaluate')) {
      aiApproach += ' For analysis tasks, AI can apply standard frameworks competently and identify obvious patterns, but may miss nuances that come from deep engagement with the material.';
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üîç', text: 'Surface-level analysis using standard frameworks without deeper insight', risk: 'high' });
    }

    if (briefLower.includes('case') || briefLower.includes('company') || briefLower.includes('business')) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üè¢', text: 'Generic company examples rather than specific local context', risk: 'medium' });
    }

    if (briefLower.includes('recommend') || briefLower.includes('suggest') || briefLower.includes('solution')) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üí°', text: 'Standard recommendations that could apply anywhere', risk: 'medium' });
    }

    if (briefLower.includes('theory') || briefLower.includes('framework') || briefLower.includes('concept')) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üìö', text: 'Textbook theory application without connection to specific course discussions', risk: 'medium' });
    }

    if (briefLower.includes('research') || briefLower.includes('source') || briefLower.includes('reference')) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üîó', text: 'AI may hallucinate references or use outdated sources', risk: 'high' });
    }

    // Default vulnerabilities
    if (vulnerabilities.length < 3) {
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: '‚ú®', text: 'Polished prose without evidence of learning process', risk: 'medium' });
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üéØ', text: 'No connection to in-class activities or discussions', risk: 'medium' });
      vulnerabilities.push({ icon: 'üó£Ô∏è', text: 'No way to verify student can explain or extend their work', risk: 'high' });
    }

    if (!aiApproach) {
      aiApproach = 'AI could produce a competent response that meets surface-level requirements, using appropriate academic language and structure. However, it would likely miss opportunities for genuine personal insight, specific contextual application, and evidence of the learning journey.';
    }

    document.getElementById('ai-approach').innerHTML = aiApproach;

    const checklistHtml = vulnerabilities.map(v => {
      const riskColors = {
        high: { bg: '#FEE2E2', border: '#EF4444', text: '#991B1B' },
        medium: { bg: '#FEF3C7', border: '#F59E0B', text: '#92400E' },
        low: { bg: '#F0FDF4', border: '#22C55E', text: '#166534' }
      };
      const colors = riskColors[v.risk];
      return `
        <div style="background: ${colors.bg}; border-left: 4px solid ${colors.border}; padding: 12px 16px; border-radius: 0 8px 8px 0;">
          <span style="margin-right: 8px;">${v.icon}</span>
          <span style="color: ${colors.text};">${v.text}</span>
        </div>
      `;
    }).join('');

    document.getElementById('vulnerability-checklist').innerHTML = checklistHtml;

    // Scroll to analysis
    analysisDiv.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
  };

  // Activity 2: Pathway cards toggle
  window.togglePathway = function(pathway) {
    const contentDiv = document.getElementById(`pathway-${pathway}-content`);
    const arrow = document.getElementById(`pathway-${pathway}-arrow`);
    const card = document.getElementById(`pathway-${pathway}`);

    const isOpen = contentDiv.style.display === 'block';

    // Close all pathways first
    ['a', 'b', 'c'].forEach(p => {
      document.getElementById(`pathway-${p}-content`).style.display = 'none';
      document.getElementById(`pathway-${p}-arrow`).style.transform = 'rotate(0deg)';
      document.getElementById(`pathway-${p}`).style.borderColor = '#E2E8F0';
    });

    // Open clicked one if it was closed
    if (!isOpen) {
      contentDiv.style.display = 'block';
      arrow.style.transform = 'rotate(180deg)';
      card.style.borderColor = '#4F46E5';
    }
  };

  // Activity 3: Save redesign
  window.saveRedesign = function() {
    const redesign = {
      step1: document.getElementById('redesign-step-1').value,
      step2: document.getElementById('redesign-step-2').value,
      pathways: {
        a: document.getElementById('pathway-check-a').checked,
        b: document.getElementById('pathway-check-b').checked,
        c: document.getElementById('pathway-check-c').checked
      },
      step4: document.getElementById('redesign-step-4').value,
      savedAt: new Date().toISOString()
    };

    localStorage.setItem('ai-passport-redesign', JSON.stringify(redesign));

    const confirmation = document.getElementById('save-confirmation');
    confirmation.style.display = 'block';
    setTimeout(() => { confirmation.style.display = 'none'; }, 3000);
  };

  // Load saved redesign if exists
  function loadSavedRedesign() {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-redesign');
    if (saved) {
      const redesign = JSON.parse(saved);
      if (redesign.step1) document.getElementById('redesign-step-1').value = redesign.step1;
      if (redesign.step2) document.getElementById('redesign-step-2').value = redesign.step2;
      if (redesign.pathways) {
        if (redesign.pathways.a) document.getElementById('pathway-check-a').checked = true;
        if (redesign.pathways.b) document.getElementById('pathway-check-b').checked = true;
        if (redesign.pathways.c) document.getElementById('pathway-check-c').checked = true;
      }
      if (redesign.step4) document.getElementById('redesign-step-4').value = redesign.step4;
    }
  }

  // Tab switching
  window.switchTab = function(tab) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.context-tab').forEach(t => {
      if (t.dataset.tab === tab) {
        t.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        t.style.color = 'white';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
      } else {
        t.style.background = '#F1F5F9';
        t.style.color = '#64748B';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'normal';
      }
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('.tab-panel').forEach(p => {
      p.style.display = p.dataset.panel === tab ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
  };

  // Completion tracking
  const badges = {
    1: { emoji: 'üß™', name: 'Explorer' },
    3: { emoji: 'üß†', name: 'Thinker' },
    5: { emoji: 'üõ†Ô∏è', name: 'Builder' },
    6: { emoji: 'üèÜ', name: 'Champion' }
  };

  window.recordCompletion = function() {
    const btn = document.getElementById('complete-btn');
    btn.disabled = true;
    btn.textContent = 'Recording...';
    btn.style.background = '#94A3B8';

    saveToLocalStorage();
    showCompletionSuccess();
  };

  function saveToLocalStorage() {
    const completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    completions[experienceId] = {
      completedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
      uid: uid
    };
    localStorage.setItem('ai-passport-completions', JSON.stringify(completions));
  }

  function showCompletionSuccess() {
    document.getElementById('completion-trigger').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('completion-section').style.display = 'block';

    const completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    const completedCount = Object.keys(completions).length;

    let badgeHtml = '';
    let nextBadge = null;

    for (const [count, badge] of Object.entries(badges)) {
      if (completedCount >= parseInt(count)) {
        badgeHtml += `<span style="font-size: 24px; margin: 0 4px;" title="${badge.name}">${badge.emoji}</span>`;
      } else if (!nextBadge) {
        nextBadge = { count: parseInt(count), ...badge };
      }
    }

    let progressText = `<div style="margin-bottom: 8px;">${badgeHtml || '<span style="color: #94A3B8;">Start your collection!</span>'}</div>`;
    progressText += `<p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">${completedCount} experience${completedCount !== 1 ? 's' : ''} completed</p>`;

    if (nextBadge) {
      progressText += `<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Next badge: ${nextBadge.emoji} ${nextBadge.name} (${nextBadge.count - completedCount} more)</p>`;
    }

    document.getElementById('badge-progress').innerHTML = progressText;
  }

  function checkExistingCompletion() {
    const completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    if (completions[experienceId]) {
      document.getElementById('completion-trigger').innerHTML = `
        <div style="color: #22C55E; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 8px;">‚úì</div>
        <p style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">You completed this experience on ${new Date(completions[experienceId].completedAt).toLocaleDateString()}</p>
      `;
    }
  }

  // Initialize
  loadSavedRedesign();
  checkExistingCompletion();
})();
</script>
